lead_paragraph: From Yoenis Cespedes turning spring training into a luxury car show to having to pay up to $49 to watch a game that doesn't count, baseball doesn't seem the least bit concerned about the message it's sending to the fans.

headline.print_headline: Column: Baseball Keeps Sending the Wrong Message to Its Fans
headline.main: Column: Baseball Keeps Sending the Wrong Message to Its Fans

snippet: From Yoenis Cespedes turning spring training into a luxury car show to having to pay up to $49 to watch a game that doesn't count, baseball doesn't seem the least bit concerned about the message it's sending to the fans....
